messages.subject: Perhaps a post is lost
messages.msgSnippet: There was a post to be approved in the queue, and I thought I had approved it, but now I can t find it. This group is sadly not working as well as it used to,
messages.messageBody:
There was a post to be approved in the queue, and I thought I had approved it, but now I can't find it.

This group is sadly not working as well as it used to, nor is my e-mail, and the combination of the two is distressing me some.  If another moderator has better e-mail and had a copy of that post, please send it to me, or to the group.   

To the person who posted (and I can't remember who it is) I am REALLY SORRY if I accidentally fumbled that approval somehow, and lost it.

I wish this group was as glorious as ever, but that's nostalgia, I suppose.  I also miss the forum at radicalunschooling (dot) info (which was overrun by spam-bots and let go.  I miss the unschooling (dot) com forum that Home Education Magazine hosted for a few years.  I miss lots of things probably not worth missing  :-)

Recently the facebook group is pretty busy and useful, for those who can live with facebook. :-)

http://sandradodd.com/facebookgroup will tell you a bit about it, and clicking the title on that page goes to the group.  

Some other sort of forum will come along, too, and I'll try to be there.

Sandra
